summary: Encapsulates the configuration required to create and manage a model explainability analysis job, storing parameters such as model identifiers, input data locations, and analysis settings, and provides utilities to present a readable description and concise overview of the job definition.
business_intent: Allows data science and engineering teams to set up and launch explainability assessments for machineâ€‘learning models, supporting model debugging, regulatory compliance, and trust building by generating insights into feature impact and model behavior.
